    • Estimating local toothfish biomass in CCAMLR data-poor areas

Extract haul data

Extract catch data for cpue by seabed area biomass

extract_catch_data_cpue_est(catch_data, release_data, catch_season = NULL,
  measure, mean_fish_weight = NULL, target_species)

Arguments

catch_data

catch data at haul-by-haul resolution that includes a data frame with columns of data in the following order: Unique Catch ID record reference, Fishing Season,cruise id, set id, species code, retained catch quantity (kg),long line length
release_data

release data at the haul-by-haul resolution that includes a data frame with columns of data in the following order: Fishing Season,cruise id, set id, species code and fish weights if available and measure="weights", if fish weights are not available and measure="counts" these weights are estimated
catch_season

is the CCAMLR fishing seasons of interest where the default = NULL uses all the catch data seasons included in the catch_data dataframe
measure

"counts" if only fish counts are available or "weights" if fish weights are required
mean_fish_weight

is the mean weight of a fish to estimate the fish release weights per haul if measure= "counts" otherwise the default=NULL
target_species

is the species code for the species that is targetted in the research block or reference area

Contents

  • Arguments
